casebody.data:
Deborah Lynn FOSTER, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
Ray James FOSTER, Defendant/Counterplaintiff-Appellant. SC: 157705
COA: 324853 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 14, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the second motion of defendant/counterplaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing his brief is GRANTED. The brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before February 27, 2019.
